column4: what can I use instead of this worthless samba version that is in ubuntu?
what can I use instead of samba?
NFS
what is it called in apt-get?
portmap and some more stuff, think you should follow a How-To, and also NFS only works between *nix OS's
ie; if you got windows on your net, its not a good solution
dont get samba to work?
samba sais I got no rights even though it isnt pass protected ;S
you got how many pcs?
you can ping their IP addys etc?
maybe unrar-nonfree ?
gonna try
there was unrar-free and it installed but I still cant extract
that's because you need the "non-free" version.. and it could be in multiverse/universe
ah yes thx was in multiverse
"man chmod"
and yes chmod is the 'program' ...
seriously that manually isnt written very pedagogic...
the man-pages seldom are.. but you should make an effort to learn howto read them..  :)
the way to set the executeflag is "chmod +x file"
thats what I wrote but the file didnt turn green :S
- removes ;)
if you learn to use the man-pages, you'll be far along 'mastering linux' ;)
